content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column width=”3/4″][vc_custom_heading text=”About Course” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:left|color:%2310e1bb” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]This course is completely project-based and designed to provide you with in-depth knowledge of various DevOps tools and prepare you for a career in DevOps.

DevOps focuses on bridging the gap between software developers and operations. The primary goal of DevOps is to shorten the product life cycle by delivering features, bug fixes, and solutions that align with business goals.

According to April 2021 PayScale data, the median annual salary for DevOps engineers is around $96,000, while the top 10% earn approximately $138,000 per year.

 

SysOps

  • Linux
  • Bash Scripting
  • Python Scripting
  • SQL(SQLite, MySQL)
  • Git
    And more…

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_custom_heading text=”Pre-requisite and Preparations” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%2310e1bb” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]

  • No Prior knowledge of DevOps
  • Personal PC
  • Willingness to learn

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_btn title=”APPLY NOW” style=”custom” custom_background=”#10e1bb” custom_text=”#ffffff” shape=”square” size=”lg” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Funivelcity.com%2Fonline-registration-form%2F|title:Apply|target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1572532215297{background-color: #f6f6f6 !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Details” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center|color:%2310e1bb” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]

Date: 1st November, 2021

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Duration: 6 Weeks

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Time: 2 Hours / Session

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Venue: Online

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]Price: ₦100,000[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_btn title=”APPLY NOW” style=”custom” custom_background=”#10e1bb” custom_text=”#ffffff” shape=”square” size=”lg” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Funivelcity.com%2Fonline-registration-form%2F|title:Apply|target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
